wiki.summary: On “Hurt You” The Weeknd issues a warning to a woman who is still in love with him. However, while she is looking for love, he does not want it in fear of hurting her again. The woman in question is likely Bella Hadid, and the song also delves into the pain both parties experienced after the break up. The Weeknd’s cadence on the track mirrors his singing on “Pray For Me”, and at the outset of the song a sample is included from Starboy’s “I Feel It Coming". Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: On “Hurt You” The Weeknd issues a warning to a woman who is still in love with him. However, while she is looking for love, he does not want it in fear of hurting her again. The woman in question is likely Bella Hadid, and the song also delves into the pain both parties experienced after the break up. The Weeknd’s cadence on the track mirrors his singing on “Pray For Me”, and at the outset of the song a sample is included from Starboy’s “I Feel It Coming". Throughout the rest of the song, one can also hear a sample from The Weeknd’s 6-time platinum hit “Starboy.” Read more on Last.fm.
